bibl.title: Aegean and Asia Minor Amphorae from Marina el-Alamein.
bibl.note: Polish excavations carried out in the cemetery of the town in the late 1980s and 1990s. A typological overview of the Aegean and Asia Minor types of amphorae that are the most frequent.

bibl.title: Amphores d'Égypte de la Basse Époque à l'époque arabe

bibl.seg: MAJCHEREK Grzegorz, Aegean and Asia Minor Amphorae from Marina el-Alamein.
Sylvie MARCHAND et Antigone MARANGOU (Édd.), Amphores d'Égypte de la Basse Époque à l'époque arabe = Cahiers de la céramique égyptienne 8 (2007) I, pp. 9-31, 6 pll. (profils).
Polish excavations carried out in the cemetery of the town in the late 1980s and 1990s. A typological overview of the Aegean and Asia Minor types of amphorae that are the most frequent.
